## reduceMap() function

近似\_.map，callback需返回一个Object，最后将所有返回的Object组合为一个Object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function reduceMap<T, Result extends IKeyValueMap, TResult = {
    [K in keyof T]?: Result;
}>(collection: List<T> | T[] | null | undefined, callback: ReduceMapObjectIterator<List<T> | T[] | null | undefined, Result, TResult>, accumulator?: TResult): TResult;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  collection | <code>List&lt;T&gt; &#124; T[] &#124; null &#124; undefined</code> |  |
|  callback | <code>ReduceMapObjectIterator&lt;List&lt;T&gt; &#124; T[] &#124; null &#124; undefined, Result, TResult&gt;</code> |  |
|  accumulator | <code>TResult</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TResult`
